description:
Inoue Chisato is one of three schoolgirls who befriend http://anidb.net/ch41591 [Miyu] during her trials. Her name means "close friend", indicating her strong relationship with Miyu. Early on in Episode 2, she buys two keychain charms as tokens of friendship for Miyu and herself.
Near the end of the series it is revealed that Chisato is in fact the strongest Shinma whose purpose is to destroy Miyu. During the fight she uses a weapon that was left for her by her brother.
Source: wiki
name: Inoue Chisato
